1.NPC: Oh! Hey hey hey! You're finally out of your room and up I see, you sleepy head! You've been sleeping a lot more than usual! Hey, don't ignore me!

1.Player: (Right… I forgot how much Rachel loves to talk a lot… and she talks so damn fast…)

2.Player: Yeah, I do enjoy my peace and quiet. Sleep is just a nice way to pass the time.

3.Rachel: If you sleep too much it can be bad for you! Are you okay? Feeling okay?! Do you need a hug!? I'll hug you if you really need me to! But we're just friends, you know. I'm not interested in anyone in that way. But I'm single! Don't get the wrong idea!

4.Player: No, I'm fine. I don't need a hug. We're almost home. I'm just bored, that's all.

5.Rachel: Alright! Well if you're ever not feeling well let me know! I am a doctor you know! Even if I look kind of young. Don't you dare assume just because I'm young I'm not good at what I do though! And you'd better-

6.Player: (I think I'm going to get a headache from listening to her…)

7.Player: Yeah I'll let you know if I'm not feeling well. Thanks for caring. I'm going to check up on the others. I've been holed up in my room for a while.

8.Rachel: You interrupted me! But hmph. Fine! You should go chat with the others! They've been worried too!
